NewsArticle.Title: New Rucesion and Abel
NewsArticle.Content: The sudden snow storm has finally passed, but the damage was done. The towns of Rucesion and Abel were not made for such harsh weather. The building walls started to crack and soon enough, they will eventually crumble. The news of this crisis spread across Temuair to the other towns. Architectures and engineers from all over came to offer their assistance. Within a double moon, new buildings were constructed for both Rucesion and Abel.
